SupportÂ¶

For support related to the XBRL Taxonomy Validator, you can reach out through the following channels:

  • GitHub Issues: Report bugs, request features, or ask questions by opening an issue on our GitHub repository.

  • Community Forums: Join our community forums to connect with other users, share experiences, and seek assistance from the community.

  • Email Support: Contact our support team via email for personalized assistance or inquiries related to the validator.
